item.title: Music in Berlin early June
item.description: Music in Berlin early June # A little bit of inspiration on what to do the weekend before and after Buzzwords in Berlin: Ballet in June at the Staatsballett Berlin Concerts in June at <a href=“ http://www.konzerthaus.de/programm/?datetimeAnf=1338501600&datetimeEnd=1341093600&id_language=1&month=6&year=2012" Konzerthaus Berlin Opera in June at Staatsoper Berlin Opera in June at Deutsche Oper Berlin Concerts in June at the Philharmoniker Berlin Opera in June at Komische Oper Berlin Theater (German-only, sorry, but open-air) at Hexenkessel Hoftheater
